itemDisplayName: Elastic Cloud Enterprise environment with load balancer
description: This template allows you to create 6 Virtual machines with data disks, load balanced for ports 12443 (ECE admin) and 9243 (ElasticSearch and Kibana). This template also deploys a Storage Account, Virtual Network, Public IP address, Availability Set and Network Interfaces. In this template, we use the resource loops capability to create the network interfaces and virtual machines
summary: 6 VMs in a Load Balancer and Load Balancer rules ready for ECE install
